'''Pneumousia Blocks''' are an exploration mechanic in [[Fontaine]] involving [[Arkhe]].

They are artificially created energy blocks found in the wilderness of Fontaine. They can be classified into {{Pneuma}} and {{Ousia}} blocks.

After collecting an energy block, the next Normal Attack, Charged Attack, or Plunging Attack will release the energy inside it. The energy can also be unleashed while [[diving]] underwater.

{{Tutorial|Pneumousia Block}}

==Trivia==
* Pneumousia Blocks can be used to power [[Clockwork Meka]] outside of Fontaine, where they do not have access to Fontaine's natural pneumousia resources.<ref>Archive: [[Suppression Specialist Mek]]</ref>
